name: HappyHourCard
tag_list: happy-hour, happy-hours-happy-hour-card, discount, membership, drink, deals, coupon-card
overview:
HappyHourCard (HHC) The Ultimate Entertainment Membership is comprised of an “Every Day Deals” platform, referral program and Reloadable Debit Card; referred herein as HHC’s membership.

Unlike “Daily Deal” websites and coupon books, no prepaying or embarrassing coupons are necessary; the deal is automatically deducted when payment is made with the membership.

Currently, HHC boasts over 25,000 National Happy Hours and “Member Only Offers.” HHC’s technologies include web and mobile (iPhone, iPad, Droid and BlackBerry). Location-based technology includes “Check In” and “Check Out” capabilities. The HHC membership offers consumers instant “Every Day Deals”. Deals include restaurants, automotive, health, beauty, pets, tickets, events, travel, movies and a cash back mall.
